item.title: Trump calls on Senate to stay in D.C. to vote on more than 150 nominees
item.description: President Trump wants the Senate to stay in session until it clears a backlog of more than 150 judicial and executive-branch nominees.

item.title: Biden judge blocks Trump from ending deportation amnesty for Honduras, Nicaragua, Nepal
item.description: A federal judge ordered Homeland Security to continue a deportation amnesty for migrants from Honduras, Nicaragua and Nepal, slamming President Trump ...

item.title: Trump raises tariffs on slew of U.S. trading partners
item.description: President Trump imposed tariffs ranging between 15% and 41% on more than 67 countries Thursday evening, raising tariffs to their highest levels in mor...

item.title: Trump revives Presidential Fitness Test alongside famous athletes at White House event
item.description: President Trump on Thursday revived the Presidential Fitness Test in public schools, saying it was to ensure young Americans are healthy and active.

item.title: Education Department calls on states to use flexibilities and opt out of 'burdensome' programs
